tool_description: Creates, updates, and manages price alert rules with customizable conditions, thresholds, and notification preferences for automated monitoring.

product_id.description: Product identifier to create alert rule for

alert_type.description: Type of alert: price_drop, price_increase, deal_alert, stock_alert, or competitor_change

threshold_value.description: Threshold value for triggering the alert

notification_method.description: Methods for sending notifications: email, sms, webhook, push

alert_frequency.description: How often to send alerts: immediate, daily, weekly

expiration_date.description: ISO 8601 date when alert rule expires

is_active.description: Whether the alert rule is currently active

priority_level.description: Alert priority: low, medium, high, critical

custom_message.description: Custom message to include in alert notifications

error_messages: Invalid product_id: Product identifier cannot be empty
Invalid alert_type: Must be one of price_drop, price_increase, deal_alert, stock_alert, competitor_change
Invalid threshold_value: Must be a positive number
Invalid threshold_type: Must be either percentage or absolute
Invalid notification_method: Array must contain at least one method from email, sms, webhook, push
Invalid alert_frequency: Must be one of immediate, daily, weekly
Invalid expiration_date: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date in the future
Invalid priority_level: Must be one of low, medium, high, critical
usage: Provide product_id, alert_type, threshold_value, threshold_type, and notification_method to create an alert rule. Configure additional parameters like alert_frequency, expiration_date, and priority_level as needed. Returns confirmation of rule creation with assigned rule ID.

rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created alert rule

rule_status.description: Status of rule creation: created, updated, or error

estimated_triggers.description: Estimated number of triggers per week based on historical data

rule_summary.description: Human-readable summary of the alert rule configuration
